topic.title: Insight Remote Support Data Collections
topic.keywords: data collections Insight Remote Support data log event logs Insight Remote Support data collections Remote Support data collection

section.content:
Data collection information
HP Insight Online direct connect
Row Description
Last Data Collection Transmission
The date and time of the last successful data collection
Last Data Collection Status
The transmission status; possible values are OK or Error
Next Scheduled Data Collection
The date and time of the next scheduled data collection; data collection is scheduled automatically at 30-day intervals
HP Insight Remote Support
Row Description
Last Data Collection Transmission
The date and time of the last successful data collection
Last Data Collection Status
The transmission status; possible values are OK or Error
To send data collection to HP immediately, click Send Data Collection. You must have Administrator rights to perform this task.
Related topics
Insight Remote Support Registration
Insight Remote Support Service Events
